steps.title: What to Wear
steps.description: Wear loose, comfortable clothing that can be easily rolled up to expose your arms and legs. Avoid tight-fitting clothes or complicated outfits.

steps.title: After Treatment
steps.description: Plan to take it easy after your session. Avoid strenuous activity, alcohol, and heavy meals for several hours following treatment to maximize benefits.
Avoid alcohol and caffeine on the day of your appointment. If you feel hungry , eat a light meal 30â€™ before your session, but not immediately before treatment.
